name: Jony Ahmed
description: this laptop in 24 hours, well packed and lined with clear disposable plastic to keep it sterile. Lovely slight faded around tge brim and the button on the top. Good metal buckle , easy to adjust, i've got caps that are just to thick for the warm weather, definitely 5stars, highly recommendable.

name: Likhon Ahmed
description: The laptop are such good quality and the embroidery design are all perfect :) suppliers are very kind and sweet, very helpful and communicative to make sure my order is perfect, definitely will be working with them again :)

name: Bappa Molla
description: Rasel was great to work with. she communicates well and the product was exactly as I asked for. I will always bring my business here! 10 out of 10 stars. I definitely recommend.

name: Dihan Mia
description: These are some of the best laptop on Laptop Bazar! Really loved how they turned out and will for sure purchase more

name: Ebadot Hossain
description: these are very high quality custom laptop. the water repellent material works very well and the laser cut design looks amazing. the seller communicated very well and got every detail dialed in. i will definitely be buying from again!

name: Fahim Rahman
description: Fast shipping a great customer service!! The quality is what we are looking for.
